description: QhX is a Python-based package for detecting periodic signals in red noise time series data (such as quasars), designed for applications like the Vera C. Rubin Observatory's LSST and other astronomical surveys. Using a 2D Hybrid method—cross-correlating wavelet transforms in a period-period phase space—QhX identifies and statistically vets periodicities, producing a catalog of detected periods with visualization across photometric bands.
title: QhX-Quasar harmonic eXplorer
